name: Harmony of Keys
snippet: Harmony of Keys was created as a phase one role out of the website dedicated to my wife and myself. Phase one being the invitation to our wedding.

name: Salon St. George
snippet: Salon St. George is a wonderful salon in Edina Minnesota. They provide a salon atmosphere for pampering and beautifications, a barber shop for clean cuts and smooth shaves, and hair replacement for those in need.

name: Homes by Legacy
snippet: Homes by Legacy Builders is a great new construction and remodeling company in the Twin Cities. Their attention to detail and on staff architectural designers help to create masterfully crafted living and work spaces.
